meanings.definition: In a zonal manner or relating to zones.
meanings.sent1: The zonally colored map helped us understand different climate regions.
meanings.sent2: The zonally arranged plants created a beautiful garden.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her zonally organized closet was like a rainbow of clothes.
meanings.sent4: The zonally decorated room felt like stepping into a different world.
meanings.sent5: The zonally patterned wallpaper made the room feel cozy and inviting.

meanings.definition: Along or in the direction of a zone.
meanings.sent1: We traveled zonally from the warm beach to the snowy mountains.
meanings.sent2: The river flows zonally, following the path of the valley.
meanings.sent3: The birds migrated zonally, following the changing weather.
meanings.sent4: The students walked zonally along the hallway to their next class.
meanings.sent5: The car drove zonally through the different neighborhoods of the city.

meanings.sent1: The zonally segmented cake had different flavors in each section.
meanings.sent2: The zonally divided city had distinct districts for shopping and dining.
meanings.sent3: The zonally split soccer field confused the players during the game.
meanings.sent4: The zonally organized event had separate areas for food, games, and music.
meanings.sent5: The zonally partitioned office space allowed each team to have their own area.
